definition: good times and hardships/joys and tribulations/for better or for worse
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
to share joys and sorrows/sharing good times and hard times/same as 同甘共苦

sentences.english: Real friends should share the danger.
sentences.chinese: 真正的朋友应该同甘苦共患难。

sentences.english: Still do not understand the joys of life, only know that longing and yearning for innocently.
sentences.chinese: 还不懂得生活的甘苦，只知道傻傻地憧憬和向往。

sentences.english: They lived in weal and woe.
Therefore, only reading their own people in order to experience one of the stand.
sentences.chinese: 所以，只有读书人自己才能体会其中的甘苦。

sentences.english: We've been throught thick and thin together.
sentences.chinese: 我们一直是同甘苦，共患难。

sentences.english: Perhaps, love is willing to pay the share, close-knit.
sentences.chinese: 或许，爱就是心甘情愿的付出，甘苦与共的分享。

sentences.english: You should not know the joys and sorrows without experienced yourself.
sentences.chinese: 若非亲身经历，岂知其中甘苦。

sentences.english: He was my companion in joy and in sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他是与我甘苦与共的朋友。

sentences.english: Cadres should share the joys and sorrows of the masses.
sentences.chinese: 干部应和群众甘苦与共。

sentences.english: We appreciate fellowship in prosperity and adversity .
sentences.chinese: 我们赞赏甘苦与共的精神。
每个人的一生中都有其甘苦。

sentences.english: They cast in their lot with the workers and peasants in the struggle.
sentences.chinese: 他们在斗争中和工农同甘苦共命运。

sentences.english: Every life has its roses and thorns.
sentences.chinese: 生活总有苦与乐，甘苦参半。

definition: sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life
a complete gamut of all five flavors (idiom); every flavor under the sun
to share joys and sorrows/sharing good times and hard times/same as 同甘共苦
body odor/to appreciate a subtle taste
to have experienced a lot of/to have been through
